name: Alejandro Hurtado
tagline: A web developer. Testing github pages as personal site.
body:
### What I'm doing

Testing how to deploy Symfony2 application  to the [Openshift](https://www.openshift.com/) of RedHat and working with [Cloud9](https://c9.io/).

Even when there some project for deploy Symonfy 2 (see [boekkooi](https://github.com/boekkooi/openshift-diy-symfony) or [eschabell](https://github.com/eschabell/openshift-symfony) ) I do it on my own way.

The result in [testa ](http://testa-awebzone.rhcloud.com/app.php)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
